name: Penmia
tag_list: notebook, diary, journal, capture, record, memories, moments, tags, posts, tabs, customize, secure, protected, encrypted, private, free, mobile-app
overview: Penmia is a free, online application that allows users to easily record memorable moments in life in a fun, enjoyable way. Memories in Penmia are for your eyes only and with assistance from Penmia can be organized by date, time, robust tagging and unlimited number of tabs. The user interface is very intuitive and clean - the inner face is laid out to replicate a notebook with several tabs, and memories can be organized within those tabs using the tagging features. Users have the ability to attach pictures to posts as well as external site links (think photo sharing sites, personal video uploads) for easy reference to detailed information already available online. Security is at the front and center of the application: all personally identifiable information as well as the memories are stored using 256-bit encryption, that’s bank level security! There is also a mobile site for those dedicated users that want to post on the go.
